items.title: SF Hello
items.itemDescription:
Say hello to SF Hello—our font developed by Apple for use in Apple Professional Learning communications.

Regional versions that support Arabic, Chinese, Japanese, Korean, and Thai are also available, along with SF Mono, the Apple font used for code.

items.title: Accessibility Assistant - iPad
items.itemDescription:
The Accessibility Assistant shortcut creates a summary of accessibility features and resources by asking questions about a person's needs. This is a Web Clip that will open in Safari and prompt for installation into the Shortcuts application.

Once added, select the needs of the user and choose as many as needed. This creates a note populated with Apple Support page links and resources, on suggested built-in accessibility features.

The Accessibility Assistant shortcut creates a summary of accessibility features and resources by asking questions about a person's needs. This is a Web Clip that will open in Safari and prompt for installation into the Shortcuts application.

Once added, select the needs of the user and choose as many as needed. This creates a note populated with Apple Support page links and resources, on suggested built-in accessibility features.
items.title: Accessibility Assistant - Mac
SEED
items.itemDescription: Explore the latest news and resources for your growth as an Apple Professional Learning Specialist. The Apple SEED app helps you get ready for any learning experience with news, tips, games, and other training resources—where and when you need them.

items.title: WWAPL Summit
items.itemDescription: WWAPL Summit is Apple Professional Learning's annual Worldwide Specialist Conference where Specialists can attend sessions and meet with Apple Professional Learning leadership.

Growth and Progress Snapshot (GPS) is a learning tool designed to help identify what great behaviors look and sound like related to a specific topic.

Use it to assess your current knowledge, skills, and behaviors around a topic to create high-quality Apple Professional Learning experiences.
items.title: Growth Progress Snapshot
Session Designer
items.itemDescription: This mapping tool is created to help you design highly engaging, hands-on Apple Professional Learning experiences. It incudes a Planning Canvas with design elements and a Session section to plan your session in detail.

Use the Agenda template to communicate your upcoming Apple Professional Learning experiences with any audience, from large groups to small groups, in-person or virtual.

[Learn more about how to communicate with Agenda ›](https://seedsales.apple.com/home/collection/R006046-en_WW)
items.title: Agenda

items.itemDescription:
Use the Roster template to keep track of session attendance.timothy.hart
gmail.com [Learn more about how to communicate with Roster ›](https://seedsales.apple.com/home/collection/R006046-en_WW)
items.title: Roster

items.itemDescription:
Use the Brief template to highlight the impact of your Apple Professional Learning experiences and stay connected with your audiences.



[Learn more about how to communicate with Brief ›](https://seedsales.apple.com/home/collection/R006046-en_WW)
items.title: Brief
Focus Plan
items.itemDescription:
Use the Focus Plan template to communicate a clear set of goals for an Apple Professional Learning engagement.

[Learn more about how to communicate with Focus Plan ›](https://seedsales.apple.com/home/collection/R006046-en_WW)

items.title: SF Hello
items.itemDescription:
Say hello to SF Hello—our font developed by Apple for use on any Apple Professional Learning communication.

Regional versions that support Arabic, Chinese, Japanese, Korean, and Thai are also available, along with SF Mono, the Apple font used for code.
This collection of PDF documents provides an overview of Apple Professional Learning and the types of offerings available to customers.
items.title: Flyers
APLS Signature
items.itemDescription: "The signature is only for use by approved Apple Professional Learning Specialists

Apple Professional Learning (APL) Compass is an interactive resource that can help leaders, educators, and IT evaluate their needs and figure out where to go next on their professional learning journey. Compass is a Numbers spreadsheet, so it’s easy to share with customers, can be filled out on Mac or iPad, and shows real-time results.



[Learn more about how to use APL Compass ›](https://seedsales.apple.com/home/collection/R006184-en_WW)
items.title: APL Compass
ELC Specialist Toolkit
items.itemDescription:
The Specialist Toolkit leverages the features and flexibility of Numbers to help Specialists efficiently manage emails, scheduling, and rosters.

And for each session, there’s a corresponding sheet with a summary of the session, tools to help guide the conversation, and a flexible note-taking space.
The Executive Leadership Coaching Journal is a space for leaders to reflect on their experience and document their coaching journey.
items.title: Leadership Coaching Journal

items.itemDescription: The Deployment for Learning and Teaching Activity Guide contains instructions for hands-on exercises to facilitate Deployment for Learning and Teaching iPad and Mac sessions.
items.title: DLT Activity Guide

items.itemDescription:
The Deployment for Learning and Teaching Technology Integration Checklist is designed to support an institution’s Apple technology integration.

This resource is divided into sections with tasks for the Deployment Leadership, IT, Purchasing, and Education Technology teams.
items.title: Tech Integration Checklist

items.itemDescription:
Learning Technologies Survey gives insights into learning and teaching practices related to technology in schools.

[Learn more about Learning Technologies Survey ›](https://seedsales-corp.apple.com/home/collection/165106)
items.title: Learning Technologies Survey

items.itemDescription:
Use APLS Theme to structure your sessions while maintaining the Apple Professional Learning identity. This theme is designed to provide the best hands-on experience for your sessions.

[Learn more about how to facilitate with APLS Theme ›](https://seedsales.apple.com/home/collection/R006046-en_WW)
items.title: APLS Theme

items.itemDescription: After downloading APLS Theme, enhance your sessions with APLS Theme Guidelines: find sample slides, icons, and more.
items.title: APLS Theme - Guidelines

items.itemDescription: Visit our dedicated area in the Apple Education Community to receive important news and updates, connect with peers to collaborate on projects, or plan content for the public Forum areas.
items.title: Education Community

items.itemDescription: Learn about our latest updates to help you grow in your role as a Specialist and create the most innovative Apple Professional Learning experiences in the world. Discover tips, resources, and inspirational stories.
items.title: APL Events
